author: cms-patatrack
body:
#### PR description:

Update tools for working on GPUs, following the Patatrack developments since #29110.

#### PR validation:

Changes in use in the Patatrack releases.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Includes changes from:
  - Add options to cmsCudaRebuild.sh (cms-patatrack#469)
  - Improve the CUDAMonitoringService (cms-patatrack#506)
  - Reduce GPU memory usage (cms-patatrack#509)
  - Update cmsCudaSetup.sh handling of CUDA_FLAGS (cms-patatrack#518)
  - Remove "cuda_cxx17.h" (cms-patatrack#519)
  - Add host-to-device async copy for host::noncached::unique_ptr (cms-patatrack#529)
title: Patatrack integration - common tools updates (3/N)
